thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 7 of 265
thread.title: Laura

author: Laura
title: Laura
text:
We are brand new empty nesters and decided to give Hello Fresh a try since we both work. I was a stay at home mom for 16 years and cooked ALL the time. When our kids grew up I stopped cooking because.... what's the point. There is only 2 of us now.
I then decided that It probably wasn't good for us to not eat dinner or only snack and a co worker suggested that we try this.
I decided to use a "first week free" coupon from her and We are hooked. We do 3 meals a week and that works for us.
I hope this helps.
